data.sampled: The exchange rate for a foreign ATM is different because it is set by the local bank that owns the ATM and is based on the current exchange rates between the local currency and the currency of your home country. Additionally, the bank may also add a markup to the exchange rate to cover their costs.

data.sampled: The category for your question is "age_limit". According to our terms and conditions, your kids need to be at least 18 years old to use our service. This is to ensure that they are able to legally enter into a contract with us and to protect their personal information. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and hope that you understand the importance of following these rules to keep our service safe and secure.

data.sampled: If you notice a strange withdrawal in your statement, you should check your transaction history to see if you recognize the transaction. If you are unable to identify the transaction, you should contact your bank immediately and ask for their assistance. They can help you dispute the transaction and potentially get your money back if it was unauthorized.

data.sampled: The category for this sentence is "verify_my_identity". You should follow the instructions provided to complete the verification process. This may involve submitting additional information or documents to prove your identity. Once your identity has been verified, you should be able to continue using the service as usual.
